properties.name: BFR C1
properties.site-address: Car Park, Pytchley Court, Corby, NN17 2PL

properties.name: BFR C16
properties.site-address: Garage Court, Lindisfarne Road, Corby, NN17 2HW
properties.notes: No additional update. Majority of site is in public sector ownership but the remaining garages are private. Site considered in mutiple ownership as a result.

properties.name: BFR C20
properties.site-address: Maple House, Canada Square, Corby, NN18 9HU
properties.notes: Proposed P2LP housing allocation site. No additional update. A Tree Preservation Order exists on site (TPO/2014/5)

properties.name: BFR C23
properties.site-address: Former Our Lady Pope John School, Tower Hill Road, Corby, NN18 0TF
properties.notes: Detailed planning application for the erection of 88 dwellings, together with access roads parking and open space/landscaping. Previous application lapsed - 11/00215/OUT. 11/00215/OUT - No start on site at November 2017. At November 2018 - not commenced.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BFR C24
properties.site-address: Railway Station Interchange, Station Road, Corby, NN17 1NA
properties.notes: Site previously assessed through SHLAA as site 2030. The site has been subject to a bid to the HCA for Starter Homes funding and it was assumed that 40 dwellings could be delivered on the site. However, as part of an urban design review, consideration was also made of a mix of uses being deployed on site which reduces the developable area for housing (assuming 50dph) an alternative yield of 29 dwellings has been assumed.. Awaiting S106

properties.name: BFR C25
properties.site-address: Beanfield School, off Glastonbury Road, Corby, NN18 0DJ
properties.notes: 80 new residential dwellings. Site is under construction at November 2017 pursuant to extant permission (no completions to date). At March 2018, 32 completions.

properties.name: BFR C26
properties.site-address: Parkland Gateway, George Street, Corby, NN17 1QG
properties.notes: Site previously assessed through SHLAA as site 2037. The site was previously been subject to a bid to the HCA for Starter Homes funding and it was assumed that 40 dwellings could be delivered on the site. However, as part of an urban design review, consideration was also made of higher densities (flats) being deployed on site and assuming 100dph an alternative yield of 63 dwellings has been assumed.

properties.name: BFR C27
properties.site-address: Kingswood School, Gainsborough Road, Corby, NN18 9NQ
properties.notes: Erection of up to 131 no. dwellings, provision of open space and works.. Site is under construction at November 2017 pursuant to extant permission (12 dwellings completed to date, 10 starts). At March 2018, 57 completions.
